comments:
AJDT sometimes gets Eclipse into a bad mode where I can no longer save files. I 
have to kill it from the task manager and copy/paste and unsaved files to 
emacs :-(

Sample stack trace:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Attempted to beginRule: 
L/crankjAgent/testsrc/com/crankj/monitor/ui/TestStrutsRequestMonitor.java, does 
not match outer scope rule: L/crankjAgent/build.xml

In looking further at the log, there are some preceeding errors. This may be a 
conflict between AJDT and the WTP plugins I've installed or it may be a WTP and 
NOT be an AJDT bug at all. I have updated my WTP components to the latest and 
will keep an eye to see if this still happens...
